arts.ttl: Thomas Tuchel axes Arsenal star from England squad to face Serbia despite STARTING last match
arts.sum: Thomas Tuchel can only pick a 23-man squad for Tuesday night's trip to face Serbia in Belgrade, meaning he faced a tough choice over which player from his 24-man group to leave out

Absences equal opportunity Thomas Tuchel said as early as March that he knew around ’16 players’ that would form part of his squad should England, as expected, seal World Cup qualification for next summer’s tournament. arts.ttl: England star is AXED entirely by Thomas Tuchel from his squad to face Serbia - despite starting against Andorra
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE: Boss Thomas Tuchel had 24 players at his disposal but, as per UEFA rules, he could only name 23 and the Arsenal full back has been omitted.

arts.ttl: Stojkovic’s struggles continue as Serbia chase euphoria against England
arts.sum: Lack of form among head coach’s attackers and a dearth of tactical solutions have led to a shortage of fan passion The TV show Only Fools and Horses was extremely popular in Serbia, which is no surprise considering most of the business in this former Yugoslav republic is done in the “grey zone”. Shady people with lots of money and little education are all around in management positions, which is the reason for protests across the country. For decades, people such as Derek “Del Boy” Trotter – who have good connections and know how “the street works” – have held executive positions at the top of Serbian football. They are perceived as loyal to the ruling political party (currently the Serbian Progressive party). It is the main reason why people in the country have lost belief in the domestic league and the national team. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Harry Kane insists England will WALK OFF if targeted with racist abuse from Serbia fans
arts.sum: Harry Kane has made it clear that England are willing to walk off when they take on Serbia in Belgrade if they are subjected to racist abuse - with the hosts already being punished for such acts
